sentences.cn: 你是虔诚的教众还是狂热的信徒?

sentences.en: Each of the several chief theories has its host of zealous partisans.
sentences.cn: 那几种主要见解,每种都有许多热烈的拥护者.

sentences.en: Edward Heath , zealous for his European relationship, was increasingly absorbed by domestic crisis.
sentences.cn: 热衷于同欧洲各国搞好关系的爱德华·希斯也被国内危机搞得越来越无暇他顾.

sentences.en: He is zealous in his work.
He was a recent Catholic convert, and very zealous.
sentences.cn: 他最近才皈依天主教，是一名狂热的信徒。

sentences.en: He was more zealous than the zealots.
sentences.cn: 他比那些崇拜狂还积极.

sentences.en: Her beauty drew many zealous suitors who pursued her relentlessly.
sentences.cn: 她的丽姿引来了无数狂热的求婚者锲而不舍地追求她.

sentences.en: Maybe we celebrated a little too over zealous.
sentences.cn: 我们男生为自己庆功,好不得意了一阵子.

sentences.en: No matter what you say, he is very zealous in his work.
sentences.cn: 无论你怎么说, 他对工作是很热心的.

sentences.en: She made zealous efforts to clean up the classroom.
sentences.cn: 她非常热心地努力清扫教室.

sentences.en: She was a zealous worker for charitable bodies.
sentences.cn: 她对慈善事业充满热忱。

sentences.en: She was most zealous in performing her duties.
The farmers are zealous for a bumper harvest this year.
sentences.cn: 农民们积极争取今年大丰收.

sentences.en: The salesman seems very zealous to please.
sentences.cn: 这位售货员看来非常热情,想取悦顾客.

sentences.en: We zealous serve for you! We sincere cooperate with you!
sentences.cn: 我们热忱的为您服务! 我们真诚的与您合作!

words.tran_cn: 热切的,热情的,热烈的,有力的,坚决的,虔诚的

trans.tran_en: someone who is zealous does or supports something with great energy
